about_the_game:
Gather 'round, dear friend, for a tale of bonds that transcend time and trials. In this heartwarming DLC for Mosaic Chronicles, embark on a new journey inspired by Olga Gromyko's enchanting storytelling. Piece together over 30 exquisite stained-glass mosaics to uncover a story of true friendship - "Nothing Personal".

Key Features:

  • Over 30 New Puzzles: Lose yourself in hours of captivating puzzle-solving as you assemble stunning stained-glass mosaics.
  • Heartwarming Story: Experience a touching narrative about the enduring power of friendship.
  • Immersive Atmosphere: Enjoy the beautiful artwork and tranquil music as you progress through the story.
  • Challenge Yourself: Choose from four difficulty levels to tailor the experience to your skill.
  • Track Your Progress: Visit the gallery to admire your completed mosaics and relive the story's magic.

Will you discover the true meaning of friendship? The pieces are waiting...
